ad_text: O.C. Maillet Transport Ltd. Sponsored New Brunswick Family Owned Business, has one opening for Full Time Class #1 Driver to do weekly runs between the Ontario/Quebec and the Maritimes. We also have some Western Canadian Runs available also for those wanting these runs. All company drivers are on ELD's (Electronic Logging Devices). Qualifications: - has a good safety record - has 3 recent years experience - has a clean driving abstract - has a clean criminal background Benefits: - Competitive pay package - No Slip Seating, your truck to bring home. - Paid weekly (Direct Deposit) - Home every weekend (Eastern Canada) - Company benefits (Health, Medical, Dental, Life, Paid Sick Days, Retirement Plan, etc.…) - Working for a family business in operation since 1971. If interested please email maurice@maillettransport.com with a resume/drivers abstract/criminal record check or fax this documentation to 506-955-1084. You can also apply on our career page on our website. www.maillettransport.com/careers or drop documents in person. Information about the company can be found at http://www.maillettransport.com/ FULL-TIME · BUCTOUCHE, NEW BRUNSWICK Canada Highway - Class #1 -Long-haul Apply now
